body_content.explanation: an unpleasant effect of a drug, medical treatment, or vaccine (= a substance put into a person's body to stop them getting a disease) that happens in addition to the main intended effect:
examples: Does this drug have any side effects?
Chemotherapy can have some very unpleasant side-effects.

body_content.explanation: an unexpected result of a situation:
examples: A side effect of the new law is that fewer people will take out insurance.
Thousands of passengers along the route constantly suffer the side-effects of the upgrade work.
